column1: THIS AGREEMENT (the “Agreement”) is made this 15th day of December, 2014, by and between RESTAURANT BRANDS INTERNATIONAL INC., a Canadian corporation with its principal offices located at 874 Sinclair Road, Oakville, Ontario, Canada (“RBI”) and Marc Caira, residing at 9 Boardwalk Drive, Toronto, Ontario M4L6T1 (“Consultant”).
RBI desires to retain the Consultant to provide certain services as described in Exhibit “A”, attached and made a part of this Agreement (collectively the “Services”).
